question: Organisms that live deep in the ocean must be able to withstand what?

nodes.text: The sun is something organisms that live deep in the ocean must be able to withstand.
Significant water pressure is something organisms that live deep in the ocean must be able to withstand.
Tsunamis are something organisms that live deep in the ocean must be able to withstand.
Extreme water pressure is something organisms that live deep in the ocean must be able to withstand.
